ctu_text:
**Step 4:** Acquire the receipt/acknowledgment of the successful submission of the application form from the District Social Welfare Office.
> **Post-Application Processes:** **Step 1:** On receipt of the application duly completed by the applicant with regard to the DSWO disability and type of prosthetic aid required shall consolidate the list and forward it to the District Level Sanctioning Committee. **Step 2:** The District Level Sanctioning Committee authorizes the District Social Welfare Officer to purchase these aids/fitments from the approved agencies for onward disbursement among the sanctioned beneficiaries.
> **Check Application Status:** The District Social Welfare Officer (DSWO) / Deputy Commissioner/ Composite Rehabilitation Center (CRC) can be contacted regarding the application status of the scheme.
